name: immortally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very special or famous and therefore likely to be remembered for a long time: She is the Oscar-nominated actress who immortally created these roles on stage. The novel is one of the most immortally funny works of English literature.
in a way that will live or last forever: Even in death the vampires are immortally wedded, as they knew that they would be. He asked whether people believe they will live immortally.
